name: The Slamjam RPG DEMO REMASTERED
description:
The Slamjam RPG Demo REMASTERED! Recreated out of love, and not at all after losing all the

original files when I switched computers.

This is a game I am making in RPG maker right now and is purely a work of love.

Even though most of the "humor" is complete inside I still feel people could enjoy

it. And so I have elected to upload The demo To both itch and steam, so please enjoy!

*Credits!*

""""Writing"""" - Thebeststickman

Coding - The lovely people who made RPG Maker MV And VX ACE

""""Art"""" - Thebeststickman, Duffzilla

Art - The lovely people who created the default art for RPG Maker MV And VX ACE

Music - The Lovely people who created the default and DLC Music for RPG Maker MV And VX ACE

""""Concept"""" - Thebeststickman

Special Thanks - My friends and family, for being fantastic individuals. and giving me every opportunity to succeed in life.

Extra SPECIAL Thanks - The Slamjam, Some of the greatest people I know are in

that Skype chat.

Super Ultra Omega Special Thanks - Duffzilla For creating the masterpiece that

is the Face for when Gelly is speaking
